title: What Does Optimized for Xbox Series X Mean? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 06.25.20
description:

 Xbox goes into detail on Series X optimization, you're going swimming in Animal Crossing, and Greg and Bless are stoked for Avengers! 

Time Stamps -

Mohammed Mohammed
Conner Nolan
Black Jack
